publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-604# Christine Grahame: Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age—That the Parliament notes with concern that it is one year since the publication of the Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age yet implementation of only one of its main recommendations, establishing a National Care Commission, has recently been initiated, and that not in full, and urges the Scottish Executive as a matter of urgency to produce a detailed programme for full implementation of its substantial and just recommendations to reflect the respect and value that the Parliament places on elderly people in society.
S1M-604# Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age (lodged on 29 February 2000) Alex Neil*, Bruce Crawford*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Kay Ullrich*, Fergus Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-604# Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age (lodged on 29 February 2000) Colin Campbell*, Richard Lochhead*, Brian Adam*

S1M-604# Christine Grahame: Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age—That the Parliament notes with concern that it is one year since the publication of the Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age yet implementation of only one of its main recommendations, establishing a National Care Commission, has recently been initiated, and that not in full, and urges the Scottish Executive as a matter of urgency to produce a detailed programme for full implementation of its substantial and just recommendations to reflect the respect and value that the Parliament places on elderly people in society. Supported by: Alex Neil, Bruce Crawford, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Kay Ullrich, Fergus Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Colin Campbell, Richard Lochhead, Brian Adam, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-604# Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age (lodged on 29 February 2000) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Linda Fabiani*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-604# Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age (lodged on 29 February 2000) Robin Harper*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-604# Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age (lodged on 29 February 2000) Irene McGugan*, Robert Brown*
S1M-604# Sutherland Report With Respect to Old Age (lodged on 29 February 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*

Supported by: Alex Neil, Bruce Crawford, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Kay Ullrich, Fergus Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Colin Campbell, Richard Lochhead, Brian Adam, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dr Winnie Ewing, Linda Fabiani, Andrew Wilson, Robin Harper, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Robert Brown, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Donald Gorrie*
